Kim, do you know what you were doing when this occurred?  

From the log it appears that some exception occurred during the handling of a viewer's double click listener.  When the JFace SafeRunnable tried to show the error dialog, the display was null.  (The most likely reason this can happen is when the shell is null and the code is running from a non-UI thread, or else the shell itself returned a null display).

Can you reproduce this?
I dont quite remember what I was doing but I know I was writing and testing code that caused the error.  I wasn't able to reproduce this after the first time.
closing bug since this was not reproducible.
Changing OS from Mac OS to Mac OS X as per bug 185991
